locale.name: en
locale.string: MSGE000 : General Message validation & translation Error
MSGE001 : Unable to determine effective time of the event
MSGE002 : Missing languageCode, assuming eng
MSGE003 : Can't determine the primary subject of this action
MSGE004 : Can't determine the author of this action
MSGE005 : Missing authored time for the event
MSGE006 : Author must be an Organization or Healthcare Worker
MSGW001 : Data enterer must either be an Organization or Healthcare Worker, information will be ignored
MSGW002 : Couldn't process data enterer, information will be ignored
MSGE007 : Couldn't process responsible party entry due to validation errors
MSGW003 : Couldn't process occurence location, information will be ingored
MSGW004 : Couldn't process data entry location, information will be ignored
MSGE008 : Cannot determine the effect time for the subject of this message, you can set one directly or use ContextConduction
MSGE009 : Don't understand status code
MSGE00A : Cannot process invalid message
MSGE00B : Registry record must have a custodian
MSGE00C : Unsupported trigger event code
MSGE00D : Cannot determine primary identifier of the custodial device
MSGE00E : Cannot determine jurisdiction name of the custodial device
MSGE00F : Cannot determine the assigned repository name of the custodial device
MSGE010 : StatusCode for Role must come from RoleStatus
MSGE011 : "Normal" state is a pseudo state for RoleStatus, please use Active or Pending instead
MSGW005 : Effective time for role is missing, assuming time is effective immediately
MSGE012 : Registration event missing identified entity
MSGW006 : Deceased indicator is populated based on Deceased time in this registry and will be ignored. Please populate the deceased time property instead
MSGW007 : Multiple birth indicator is populated based on Multiple birth order in this registry and will be ignored. Please populate the multiple birth order property instead
MSGE04B : Langauge code must come from either ISO 639-3 of ISO 639-1 code system
MSGE04C : Could not find a valid translation from the supplied language code system ISO 639-3 to ISO 639-1
General Data Translation / Persistence Error
DTPE001 : Persistence of event failed
DBCF000 : General Data persistence Business Constraint Failure
DBCF001 : Event has already been persisted, will not persist duplicate records
PBCF000 : General Privacy / security Business Constraint Failure
DSCF000 : General Decision Support Constraint Failure

New notifications

In order to view this content you must execute the appropriate GET against the SHR
SBSE001 : No subscription could be found that matches this criteria
SBSE001.a : Please ensure appropriate criteria have been issued to this service
